snippet: The tests will be performed in accordance with new state regulations that discourage an earlier protocol in which the water was run for two hours the night before sampling....
abstract: New York City school officials say they will retest water in public school buildings for unsafe levels of lead after earlier testing procedure was criticized; testing will be carried out in accordance with state regulations issued in fall.
lead_paragraph: The tests will be performed in accordance with new state regulations that discourage an earlier protocol in which the water was run for two hours the night before sampling.

headline.main: Water at New York City Schools Will Be Retested for Lead
headline.print_headline: Water at Schools to Be Retested for Lead
